org.freezedry.difference

Class ObjectDifferenceCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.freezedry.difference.ObjectDifferenceCalculator

  • public class ObjectDifferenceCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    Calculates the difference between two object of the same type and lists the flattened properties that differ. Also provides access to flatten objects into key-value pairs.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ObjectDifferenceCalculator.Difference
      Class representing the difference between the object's and the reference object's value.

      Constructs a basic key-value writer that uses the specified renderers and separator.

      Constructs a basic key-value writer that uses the default renderers and specified separator.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ObjectDifferenceCalculator

        public ObjectDifferenceCalculator(java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<?>,PersistenceRenderer> renderers,
                          PersistenceRenderer arrayRenderer,
                          java.lang.String keySeparator)
        Constructs a basic key-value writer that uses the specified renderers and separator.
        Parameters:
        renderers - The mapping between the Class represented by an InfoNode and the PersistenceRenderer used to create the key-value pair.
        arrayRenderer - The PersistenceRenderer used to create key-value pairs for InfoNodes that represent an array.
        keySeparator - The separator between the flattened elements of the key
        See Also:
        AbstractKeyValueBuilder.getRenderer(Class)

    • Method Detail

      • calculateDifference

        public final <T> java.util.Map<java.lang.String,ObjectDifferenceCalculator.Difference> calculateDifference(T object,
                                                                                            T referenceObject)
        Calculates the difference between the two specified objects and returns the difference as key-value pairs. The ObjectDifferenceCalculator.Difference object holds the value of the object's property and the referenceObjects's property that differ.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The object's and the reference object's type.
        Parameters:
        object - The new object to compare against the reference object
        referenceObject - The reference object against which to compare the object
        Returns:
        A Map that holds the flattened property names of all the properties that are different between the object and the reference object. For each entry in the map, the ObjectDifferenceCalculator.Difference holds the object's property value and the reference object's property value

      • flattenObject

        public final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> flattenObject(java.lang.Object object)
        Flattens the object into key-value pairs.
        Parameters:
        object - The object to flatten
        Returns:
        The flattened version of the object
        See Also:
        KeyValueBuilder
